title: Attempting to reconnect every 2 minutes cost me a ranked game
body:
My internet its perfect 

Played 2 games before everything was fine

when i got in the third game at the end of the game it started acting kinda weird 

was getting disconnected all the time and was "attempting to reconnect" all the time 

And us the teams ADC i couldn't do anything and we lost the game 

i think i got DC like 10 times in 20 minutes and ha to exit the game and reconnect to work for 2 minutes and then DC again on its own 

**RIOT FIX YOUR SERVERS**

And to prove that its not only me that i had the issue HERE 

blob:http://imgur.com/619f4dda-5088-4fa2-8f96-8b7421c0cf1b

replies.body: As Rineyy suggested, it sounds like your network lost strength and caused you to disconnect from the match.  If you're still experiencing any problems, please go over the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide.  Let me know if you have any issues afterwards!

Receiving an "Attempting to Reconnect" message usually means the connection between your network and the LoL servers (not your network in general) is being interrupted. 

[Troubleshoot your connectivity issues.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)
